definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Tea culture is a special form of culture with a decidedly Beijing touch about it.
sentences.chinese: 茶館文化是極具中國京味特色的文化。

sentences.english: For dinner we went to a place called "Taste Good Beijing Cuisine" for some Beijing, well, cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 晚上我們全家在一家叫“京味軒”的飯館喫北京菜。

sentences.english: Mentions the Beijing style literature, has no alternative but to ravel its meaning.
sentences.chinese: 說起京味文學，不能不弄明白它的含義。

definition: erhua variant of 爆肚[bao4 du3]
Beijing resident/Peking ape-man, Homo erectus pekinensis (c. 600,000 BC), discovered in 1921 at Zhoukoudian 周口店[Zhou1 kou3 dian4], Beijing
erhua variant of 飯館|饭馆[fan4 guan3]
shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
hot pot/a dish where thinly sliced meat and vegetables are boiled briefly in a broth and then served with dipping sauces
